00038 unsigned int
00039 URLE::CalcMaxCompSize( unsigned int srcSize )
00040 {
00043         return srcSize + ( srcSize + 2 ) / 3;
00044 }

00046 //----------------------------------------------------------
00047 unsigned int
00048 URLE::Compress( unsigned char* dest, const unsigned char* source, unsigned int srcSize )
00049 {
00051         const unsigned char* srcEnd = source + srcSize;
00052         const unsigned char* src = source;
00053         unsigned char* dst = dest;
00054 
00056         unsigned int end = 0;
00057         unsigned int runLen = 0;
00058         while ( src != srcEnd )
00059         {
00061                 end = Min( 128U, ( unsigned int )( srcEnd - src ) );
00062                 runLen = 1;
00063                 while ( runLen < end && src[ 0 ] == src[ runLen ] )
00064                         ++runLen;
00065 
00067                 if ( runLen > 1 || ( src + 1 ) == srcEnd )
00068                 {
00070                         *dst++ = 0x80 | ( runLen - 1 );
00071                         *dst++ = src[ 0 ];
00072                         src += runLen;
00073                 }
00074 
00076                 end = Min( 128U, ( unsigned int )( srcEnd - src ) );
00077                 runLen = 1;
00078                 while ( runLen < end && src[ runLen - 1 ] != src[ runLen ] )
00079                         ++runLen;
00080 
00082                 if ( runLen > 1 )
00083                 {
00085                         *dst++ = ( ( --runLen ) - 1 );
00086                         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < runLen; ++i )
00087                                 *dst++ = src[ i ];
00088                         src += runLen;
00089                 }
00090         }
00091 
00093         return ( unsigned int )( dst - dest );
00094 }
00095 
00096 //----------------------------------------------------------
00097 void
00098 URLE::Decompress( unsigned char* dst, unsigned int dstSize, const unsigned char* src )
00099 {
00101         while ( ( int )dstSize > 0 )
00102         {
00105                 unsigned char cmd = *src++;
00106                 unsigned char runLen = ( cmd & 0x7F ) + 1;
00107                 dstSize -= runLen;
00108                 if ( cmd & 0x80 )
00109                 {
00110                         while ( runLen-- > 0 )
00111                                 *dst++ = *src;
00112                         ++src;
00113                 }
00114                 else
00115                 {
00116                         while ( runLen-- > 0 )
00117                                 *dst++ = *src++;
00118                 }
00119         }
00120 }
